context: Do you know when Despicable Me was released?
Yes, actually I remember it came out in 2010. Have you seen it?
Yes I took my little sister to go see it. Do you know who some of the actors are?
I sure do, I'm sure you know it has Steve Carell but it also stars Rob Huebel and Kristen Wiig. Oh and Julie Andrews!
Oh I love Steve Carell, he was also im Get smart. Have you seen that one?
I have, doesn't that also have Larry Miller and Anne Hathaway?
Yes it does! Larry Miller also stars in I Am Comic with Sarah Silverman.
I knew I recognized the name, can I interest you in any information about any of these comedians?
Yes, do you know any other movies with Sarah Silverman?
resp: She was in a classic called There's Something About Mary, and she also did voice work for Wreck-it Ralph.
